title: Ore no Yubi de Midarero.: Heitengo Futarikiri no Salon de...
synopsis: Fumi Hoshiya works at a beauty salon, hoping to become a hairdresser someday. Her popular and charismatic manager, Sousuke Nanase, often chastises Fumi for her mistakes in the salon. Nonetheless, Fumi idolizes Nanase as a kind mentor and role model.
related_anime: ['Ore no Yubi de Midarero.: Heitengo no Salon, Ijiwaru ni Jirasarete']
staff: [['Noshitani, Mitsutaka', ['Director']], ['Enomoto, Takahiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Sawayama, Shinichiro', ['Script']], ['Nakazawa, Masatomo', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
